titleStmt.title: To the justices of peace, or cheef gentlemen of our parishes, and all other officers, toward the furtherance of this good woorke
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

notesStmt.note: For 12-year collection to rebuild Colyton harbor.
"Witnesse our self at Westminster the third daie of February, in the xvij. yere of our raigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
